## Install

CRAN version

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("rbace")
```

Development version

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/rbace")
```

```{r}
library("rbace")
```

## search

perform a search

```{r}
(res <- bs_search(coll = 'it', query = 'dccreator:manghi', boost = TRUE))
```

get the search metadata

```{r}
bs_meta(res)
```
